channel.title: NLP on Finklen
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Finklen

item.description: Concepts # https://eng.uber.com/lsh/ Stemming - Stemming is the process of reducing inflection in words (e.g. troubled, troubles) to their root form (e.g. trouble). The “root” in this case may not be a real root word, but just a canonical form of the original word. The most common algorithm, which is also known to be empirically effective for English, is (Porters Algorithm)[https://tartarus.org/martin/PorterStemmer/] better alternative - embeddings Lemmatization Lemmatization on the surface is very similar to stemming, where the goal is to remove inflections and map a word to its root form.
